Title: isNullable
Description: Returns 1 if a column is Nullable (i.e allows NULL values), 0 otherwise.
1 if x allows NULL values. UInt8.0 if x does not allow NULL values. UInt8.
Examples: CREATE TABLE tab (ordinary_col UInt32, nullable_col Nullable(UInt32)) ENGINE = Log;INSERT INTO tab (ordinary_col, nullable_col) VALUES (1,1), (2, 2), (3,3);SELECT isNullable(ordinary_col), isNullable(nullable_col) FROM tab;
